arts.ttl: Milan – Fiorentina | Ricci: “This is an important opportunity”
arts.sum: Samuele Ricci, the Rossoneri midfielder, spoke to DAZN before the Milan-Fiorentina match. These are his statements ahead of his first Serie A start with Milan. Many absences, a lot of responsibility. What kind of opportunity is this for you, in your first league start? “An important opportunity. I’ve worked hard in recent weeks. Maybe I’ve […]

arts.ttl: Ricci ‘fine’ with lack of playing time as Milan-Fiorentina ‘could be my chance’
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Ahead of the clash between AC Milan and Fiorentina, Samuele Ricci spoke to the media and seconded that it’s a great opportunity for him personally. Ricci has spent a lot of time on the bench at the start of this season, which perhaps wasn’t what he envisioned in the summer.
